text: Katie Holmes has been the subject of many headlines lately, not only for her wonderful onscreen work and her debut behind the camera for the film All We Had but also for rumors surrounding the supposed secret romance between she and actor Jamie Foxx. Most recently one outlandish claim was made about the star and her attempts to make some cosmetic adjustments for a steep price. As Gossip Cop notes, rumor had it that Holmes was set to pay $ 20, 000 to fix her teeth. The gossip policing site shares the rumor that was spread by an unreliable tabloid. “ According to the repeatedly discredited National Enquirer, the actress needs major dental work to fix her “ ‘ twisted ’ teeth.
